item.description:
If you are hanging around this Sunday with no plans, let us get together as a group for an impromptu social!

Read the description below of how and where. We could all gather around 3:00 pm, for some sharing and introduction, and some healing technique. [I was just congratulated by the Meetup group with a one year anniversary of being an organizer of this group and we have grown to over 200 people.

I am posting it as an event, so you could sign up and I would know to look for you. ! I will make up a meetup sign. See you there!

So this is what is happening!
The Boston Law Of Attraction Meetup members have invited us to join them for a BEACH PICNIC
this Sunday, 8/15, 1 - 6 pm. We'll have exclusive access to the lovely beach, pond & trails
at Camp Nihan (in Saugus). Bring your family & friends for a picnic, swim, hike etc.
There's canoes, kayaks & paddleboats to enjoy.

Who Should Come: members, kids & guests
Time: 1 - 6 pm (come when you can)

Donation: $5/ adult
Kids: free

RSVP here and Details at: http://www.meetup.com...
item.how_to_find_us: I will make up some sign

group.name: Freedom from Fear/ Anxiety /Emotional Trauma Group

item.name: Social Get Together for swimming, boating and socializing.
